chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall A B C M P Q T : PO, ~ colineaire (vec C A) (vec C M) -> colineaire (vec C A) (vec C Q) -> colineaire (vec P C) (vec P B) -> colineaire (vec B A) (vec B T) -> orthogonal (vec T M) (vec T B) -> orthogonal (vec P M) (vec P B) -> orthogonal (vec Q M) (vec Q C) -> colineaire (vec P Q) (vec P T) <-> sont_cocycliques C A M B

```coq
intros A B C M P Q T H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7. unfold colineaire, sont_cocycliques, orthogonal. split.
- intros H8. intros X Y Z W. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H1. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H2. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H3. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H4.
  apply Rperp_col in H5. apply Rperp_col in H6. apply Rperp_col in H7.
  apply cop_vec_eq in H8.
  destruct H8 as [H8 H9]. destruct H9 as [H9 H10]. destruct H10 as [H10 H11]. destruct H11 as [H11 H12].
  apply belong_expoints in H8. destruct H8 as [X' [H13 [H14 H15]]].
  apply belong_expoints in H9. destruct H9 as [Y' [H16 [H17 H18]]].
  apply belong_expoints in H10. destruct H10 as [Z' [H19 [H20 H21]]].
  apply belong_expoints in H11. destruct H11 as [W' [H22 [H23 H24]]].
  apply belong_expoints in H12. destruct H12 as [V' [H25 [H26 H27]]].
  assert (Col X Y Z) by (apply col_transitivity with W; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto).
  assert (Col X Y W) by (apply col_transitivity with Z; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto).
  assert (Col Z W T) by (apply col_transitivity with Y; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto).
  assert (Col V' X' C) by (apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto).
  assert (Col V' X' W') by (apply col_transitivity with C; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto).
  assert (Col V' X' Y') by (apply col_transitivity with W'; apply col_transitivity with C; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto).
  eexists; split. apply col_permutation; auto. eexists; split. apply col_permutation; auto. eexists. split; apply col_permuted_points; auto.
- intros [H8 H9]. intros X Y Z. apply Rcol_permutation in H1. apply Rcol_permutation in H2. apply Rcol_permutation in H3.
  apply Rcol_permuted_points in H8 as [W [H10 [H11 H12]]]. apply Rcol_permuted_points in H9 as [V [H13 [H14 H15]]].
  assert (Col W V X) by (apply col_permuted_points; auto).
  assert (Col W V Z) by (apply col_transitivity with X; apply col_transitivity with M; auto).
  assert (Col W V M) by (apply col_transitivity with Z; apply col_transitivity with X; apply col_transitivity with M; auto).
  assert (Col X Z Y) by (apply col_transitivity with W; apply col_transitivity with M; auto).
  assert (Col W T Z) by (apply col_transitivity with X; apply col_transitivity with B; apply col_transitivity with A; apply col_transitivity with C; auto).
  apply belong_col in H12 as [P' [H16 [H17 H18]]]. apply belong_col in H15 as [Q' [H19 [H20 H21]]].
  assert (R P Q C B) by (eexists; split; apply belong_col; auto).
  auto.
Qed.
```

original: intros A B C M P Q T H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7. unfold colineaire, sont_cocycliques, orthogonal. split. - intros H8. intros X Y Z W. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H1. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H2. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H3. apply Rcol_vec_ax in H4. apply Rperp_col in H5. apply Rperp_col in H6. apply Rperp_col in H7. apply cop_vec_eq in H8. destruct H8 as [H8 H9]. destruct H9 as [H9 H10]. destruct H10 as [H10 H11]. destruct H11 as [H11 H12]. apply belong_expoints in H8. destruct H8 as [X' [H13 [H14 H15]]]. apply belong_expoints in H9. destruct H9 as [Y' [H16 [H17 H18]]]. apply belong_expoints in H10. destruct H10 as [Z' [H19 [H20 H21]]]. apply belong_expoints in H11. destruct H11 as [W' [H22 [H23 H24]]]. apply belong_expoints in H12. destruct H12 as [V' [H25 [H26 H27]]]. assert (Col X Y Z) by (apply col_transitivity with W; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto). assert (Col X Y W) by (apply col_transitivity with Z; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto). assert (Col Z W T) by (apply col_transitivity with Y; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto). assert (Col V' X' C) by (apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto). assert (Col V' X' W') by (apply col_transitivity with C; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto). assert (Col V' X' Y') by (apply col_transitivity with W'; apply col_transitivity with C; apply col_transitivity with M; apply Rcol_vec_ax; auto). eexists; split. apply col_permutation; auto. eexists; split. apply col_permutation; auto. eexists. split; apply col_permuted_points; auto. - intros [H8 H9]. intros X Y Z. apply Rcol_permutation in H1. apply Rcol_permutation in H2. apply Rcol_permutation in H3. apply Rcol_permuted_points in H8 as [W [H10 [H11 H12]]]. apply Rcol_permuted_points in H9 as [V [H13 [H14 H15]]]. assert (Col W V X) by (apply col_permuted_points; auto). assert (Col W V Z) by (apply col_transitivity with X; apply col_transitivity with M; auto). assert (Col W V M) by (apply col_transitivity with Z; apply col_transitivity with X; apply col_transitivity with M; auto). assert (Col X Z Y) by (apply col_transitivity with W; apply col_transitivity with M; auto). assert (Col W T Z) by (apply col_transitivity with X; apply col_transitivity with B; apply col_transitivity with A; apply col_transitivity with C; auto). apply belong_col in H12 as [P' [H16 [H17 H18]]]. apply belong_col in H15 as [Q' [H19 [H20 H21]]]. assert (R P Q C B) by (eexists; split; apply belong_col; auto). auto.
